N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2527.10 - Amendments to complaint or application

State Regulations
(a) Right to amend. The DHCR may authorize an
amendment to a complaint or application at any time on good cause shown, except
that an applicant or complainant shall have the right to amend the application
or complaint in writing prior to the time within which an answer may be
filed. (b) Service. Any amendment
to an application or complaint shall be served upon all affected parties in the
same manner as the original application or complaint. (c) Amended answer or reply. When an
application or complaint is amended after an answer has been filed, all
affected parties may file an amended answer or reply within the time provided
for the answer or reply. Notes
